overview:

Danish DANTHERM in Swimming Pool Air Handling Units and Complete Air Handling Units Built in Control Equipment,

Italian SABIANA in Fan-Coil Units, Unit Heaters and Radiant Panels, The mission of DURU Klima is to proceed on its way with sound steps in a peaceful atmosphere and to remain “CLEAR-PURE” with its biggest capital of mutual trust shown to its team and collaborative companies.
